1389:2: evaṃ parīttaprahāṇaratipraviṣṭasya tadūrdhvaṃ dve gatī bhavataḥ|
1389:14: yadā cāsya dṛṣṭisthiraḥ kharaśca manaskāraḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati|
1389:18: tadā sa laukikena mārgeṇa gantukāmastatra ca prayogamārabhate lokottareṇa vā mārgeṇa [|]
1389:20: ye dṛṣṭe dharme laukikenaiva mārgeṇa pṛ(ga)cchanti|
1389:28: ) amī catvāraḥ pudgalā dṛṣṭa eva dharme laukikamārgayāni (yi)
1389:35: prathame ca dhyāne samāpattyupapattikleśāntatāṃ paśyatastatkāmavairāgyagamanamevaṃ yāvat|
1389:90: te[']pi jātyādidharmatayā avinirmuktāstāvatkālikī sā teṣāṃ sampat|
1389:116: anena paryāyeṇa kāmā vigarhitā buddhaiḥ buddhaśrāvakaiśca sadbhiḥ samyaggataiḥ,
1389:119: nāsti cāsya kiṃcit pāpakamakuśalaṃ karmākaraṇīyaṃ vadāmi|
1389:137: mārasyaiṣa nivāpo yatreme['ne]kavidhāḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmā mānasāḥ saṃbhavanti|
1389:141: ye vā punarāntarāyikā bhavantyāryaśrāvakasyāśikṣamāṇasyānekaparyāyeṇa kṛṣṇapakṣapatitā ete kāmā yadbhūyasā [|
1389:151: mahatā pariśrameṇa vividhairvicitraiḥ śilpakarmasthānaiḥ kāmāḥ saṃhriyante|
1389:158: asya vā punaḥ kāyasyādhyātmikasya rūpiṇa audārikasya cāturmahābhūtikasyaudanakalmāṣopacitasya nityotsadanasnapanapārimardanabhedana(c)
1389:170: na saktena nānyatra vyādhigrastenaivātureṇa vyādhimātropaśamāya bhaiṣajyamāptāgamo[']pyeṣaḥ|
1389:178: sa evaṃ kāmānāmaudārikalakṣaṇaṃ pratisaṃvejya yaduta ṣaḍbhirvastubhiḥ prathame dhyāne śāntalakṣaṇaṃ pratisaṃvedayati nāstyetatsarvaśa audārikatvaṃ (|
1389:180: prathame ca dhyāne śāntalakṣaṇamayamucyate lakṣaṇapratisaṃvedī manaskāraḥ|
1389:183: sa evaṃ kāmānparijñāya prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ yathāvatparyeṣṭau(ṣyau)
1389:184: dārikaśāntalakṣaṇena śrutaṃ ca cintāṃ ca vyatikrāmyaikāntena bhāvanākāreṇaivādhimucyate|
1389:186: bhāvayaṃśca yathā yathā tāmaudārikaśāntatāṃ punaḥ punaradhimucyataḥ|
1389:191: kleśaprahāṇāya ca mārge samutpanne yastadbhagavato manaskāraḥ|
1389:202: tasya tathā prahāṇārāmasya bhāvanārāmasya samyakprayuktasya sataḥ kuśalapakṣaprayogopastambhakāmapratisaṃyuktaṃ kleśakarmaparyavasthānaṃ carato vā viharato vā na samudācarati|
1389:207: tasyāprahīṇatvāt sarvveṇa sarvvamanuśayasya tannimittaṃ manasi kurvvataḥ sevanānimnaṃ cittaṃ bhavati|
1389:213: na me samyagviraktaṃ vimuktaṃ cittaṃ yaduta kāmebhyaḥ,
1389:216: ) ya[n]nvahaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā tasyānuśayasyāśeṣaprahāṇāya bhūyasyā mātrayā prahāṇārāmo vihareyaṃ|
1389:223: tasya pratipakṣaṃ ca bhāvayataḥ kālena kālaṃ prahīṇā[']prahīṇatāṃ mīmānsamānasya sarvvebhyaḥ kāmāvacarebhyaḥ kleśebhyaścittaṃ visaṃyujyate|
1389:229: tasya ca samanaskārapratyayaṃ taddhetukaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate|
1389:233: ratisaṃgrāhake ca vivekajena prītisukhena kāyaṃ pratiprīṇayati|
1389:235: kadācit kadācit dhyānavipulatarasaṃmukhībhāvena prayoganiṣṭhāphale punarmanaskāre vartamānasya nāsti kiñcidasyā(sya) bhavati|
1389:238: samaye viviktaiḥ kāmaiḥ viviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ savitarkasavicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ paṃcā[ṅ]gamupasampadya viharati|
1389:242: prahātavyasya ca prahāṇāya prāptavyasya ca prāptaye cittaṃ praṇidhatte|
1389:243: ādhimokṣikeṇa ca manaskāreṇa prahāṇāya prāptaye ca samyak prayogamārabhate|
1389:248: prayoganiṣṭhāphalenaiṣāṃ kleśaprakārāṇāṃ bhāvitānāṃ subhāvitānāṃ bhāvanāphalaṃ pratyanubhavati|
1389:259: evaṃ sati ṣaṭṣu manaskāreṣu catvāro manaskārāḥ pravighnā veditavyāḥ|
1389:267: avitarkaśca dvitīyadhyāne śāntalakṣaṇaṃ sa lakṣaṇapratisaṃvedī manaskāraḥ|
1389:271: yaḥ samāhitabhūmiko[']pyugrālambanabhārī tatprathamopanipātitayā cālambane audāriko manojalpaḥ|
1389:286: uparimāṃ bhūmimārabhya duḥkhavihārānugatatvātkuṣṇapakṣyā kāmavivekaprītisukhamevānuśaṃsānugatā bhūmiścaiṣā tādṛśī prakṛtyā yatra sthitasya nityaṃ nityakālaṃ,
1389:292: sarvaśo nāstyetadaudārikalakṣaṇamavitarkedvitīye dhyāne ityataḥ śāntaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānamasyaudārikatvasyāpagamāt|
1389:295: evaṃ bhūmau bhūmau yāvannaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattaye yathāyogaṃ sapta manaskārā veditavyāḥ|
1389:296: audārikalakṣaṇaṃ punaḥ sarvvāsvadharimāsu bhūmiṣu yāvadākiṃcanyāyatanāt samāsena dvividhaṃ veditavyaṃ|
1389:303: yasyā yasyā bhūmervairāgyaṃ karttukāmo bhavatyupariṣṭācca yathāyogaṃ śāntalakṣaṇaṃ|
1389:328: divasamapi yāvadākāṃkṣamāṇaḥ saptarā triṃdivasāni tenāha viharatīti|
1389:331: vyagracāriṇa ālambanādvivecya avyagracāriṇyālambane ekadharmatayā śāntaṃ prasannaṃ cittaṃ pravarttate|
1389:336: tenāha cetasa ekotībhāvāt sarvveṇa sarvvaṃ vitarkavicāraprahāṇādavitarkamavicāraṃ prayoganiṣṭho manaskāraḥ samādhistasyānantaraṃ taddhetukaṃ taṃtpra(kastatpra)
1389:338: tenāha samādhijaṃ īpsitā[']ninditārthaprāpteḥ prītau vā doṣadarśanāt|
1389:340: prītisukhamanupūrvveṇa gaṇayato dvitīyaṃ bhavatyevaṃ sarvvaṃ pūrvvavad veditavyam|
1389:343: ] tasmiṃśca samaye dvividho[']sya cittakṣobhakaraḥ apakṣālo[']dhigato bhavati|
1389:356: nāsti, tena tṛtīye dhyāne upekṣako viharatītyucyate|
1389:359: yathā yathā te prītisahagatāḥ saṃjñāmanasikārāḥ samudācaranti|
1389:360: sa cetpunarabhāvitatvāt tṛtīyasya dhyānasya smṛtisaṃpramoṣātkadācitkarhicit citte prītisahagatāḥ saṃjñāmanasikārāḥ samudācaranti|
1389:368: tasya tasminsamaye evamupekṣakasya viharatā smṛtasya saṃprajanya syāsevanānvayādbahulīkārānvayātprītisahagataṃ prahīyate|
1389:374: manaḥkāyena vedita sukhaṃ ca praśrabdhisukhaṃ pratisamvedayate|
1389:376: adhastadrūpaṃ sukhaṃ nāsti nāpi nirantarā upekṣā tṛtīyā[d]dhyānādūrdhvaṃ yadapyupekṣopalabhyate|
1389:379: idaṃ tadāyatanaṃ yaduta tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ yattadāryā ācakṣate|
1389:381: sukhavihārī tṛtīyaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharatīti āryāḥ punaḥ vṛddhāśca vṛddhaśrāvakāśca|
1389:387: tasya ca niṣevaṇābhyāsāttṛtīyadhyānāccalito yatra tṛtīyadhyānabhūmisukhaṃ tatprajahāti|
1389:390: tatra caturthadhyānasamāpattikāle tasmin samaye sa dhyāyī sukhaduḥkhavyatikramamanuprāpnoti|
1389:398: tanna caturthadhyānasamāpattikāle sukhasya ca prahāṇāaddvitīyadhyānasamāpattikāle duḥkhasya,
1389:405: aduḥkhāsukhā tasmin samaye prathamaṃ dhyānamupādāya sarvve adhobhūmikāḥ apakṣālāḥ prahīṇā bhavanti|
1389:417: tatrākāśādhimokṣasya varṇṇasaṃjñā nīlapītalohitāvadātādipratisaṃyuktatāmasātāmasātayā nirvirāgatayā ca samatikrānto bhavati|
1389:419: rūpa saṃjñānāṃ samatikramādanābhāsagamanahetoryā anekavidhā bahunānāprakārā varṇṇapracayahetukā āvaraṇasaṃjñā sā (yā)
1389:423: tāsāmvā punarvigamahetoryā aupacayikīsaṃjñāsteṣvavaśiṣṭeṣu viśiṣṭeṣu saṃghāteṣu pravṛttāstadyathā bhojanapānavastrālaṃkāragṛhodyānavanasenāparvvatādisaṃjñā[ḥ]|
1389:427: sa evaṃ rūpapratighanānātvasaṃjñā bhāvayitvā anantākāreṇā['']kāśādhimukto bhavati|
1389:434: tasyākāśamālambanaṃ samāpannasya punastacca tadanye ca skandhāḥ svabhūmikāḥ sāmantake punaradhobhūmikā api skandhāḥ|
1389:446: sa vijñānānantyāyatanāduccalito vijñānāt pareṇā['']lambanaṃ samanveṣamāṇo na punarlabhate (|
1389:447: ) kiñcana pratisaṃyuktaṃ rūpi vā, arūpi vā [|
1389:448: ] sa tadālambanamalabhamānaḥ sasāmāntakamaulaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanaṃ [sa]matikramya nāsti kiñcidanyadā lambanamadhimucyate|
1389:450: sa tasya saṃjñādhimokṣasya bahulīkārānvayādākiṃcanyāyatanasāmantakaṃ samatikramya yāvatprayoganiṣṭhā(n)
1389:462: na ca punaḥ sarvveṇa sarvvaṃ sāsya saṃjñā niruddhā bhavati|
1389:465: nānyatra sūkṣmā sā saṃjñā nimittālambane pravartate|
1389:467: ] evaṃ tadāyatanādhimuktaḥ sasāmantakamaulamākiñcanyāyatanaṃ samatikramya naiva saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasāmantakasya yā vatprayoganiṣṭhānmanasikārāt prayoganiṣṭhāphalaṃ maulaṃ samāpadyate|
1389:469: sarvaśa ākiñcanyāyatana[ṃ] samatikramya naiva saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanamupasampadya viharatīti||
1389:476: tatrāsaṃjñāsamāpatti [ṃ] saṃjñāvimukhena manaskāreṇa pṛthagjana eva samāpadyate,
1389:478: tatra dvābhyāṃ manaskārābhyāmanayoḥ samāpattyoḥ samāpattipraveśo bhavati|
1389:489: samanaskārasamāpannasya ca punaścittaṃ na pravartata iti|
1389:490: sa evaṃ niḥsaraṇasaṃjñā pūrvvakeṇa manaskāreṇa śubhakṛtyavītarāgasya,
1389:495: tatra naiva saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanalābhī āryaḥ pareṇa śāntena vihāreṇa viharttukāmaḥ naiva saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanāccittamuccā layati|
1389:499: ya evamākiñcanyāyatanavītarāgasya śaikṣasyārhato vā vihārasaṃjñāpūrvakeṇa manaskāreṇa cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirodha iyamucyate nirodhasamāpattirevaṃ ca punarasyāḥ prāptirbhavati||
1389:508: pūrvvenivāsadivyaśrotracyutyupapādacetaḥ paryāyamvā tameva manasi kurvan samāhitabhūmikena manaskāreṇārthapratisaṃvedī ca bhavati|
1389:513: sa kālo bhavati samayo yadasya bhāja(va)
1389:528: ] vāyumaṇḍalake vā sa tathā [a]dhimucyamānaḥ tatra prerayatyādhimokṣikeṇaiva manaskāreṇa [|
1389:537: tatrākāśadhātusaṃjñā yayā saṃjñayā laghutāṃ ca mṛdutāṃ cātmano[']dhimucyate|
1389:539: tatra yadantarālaṃ vivandhacaraṃ rūpigataṃ gamanāya tadākāśamadhimucyate [|
1389:542: tatra cittakāyasamavadhānasaṃjñā yayā cittamvā kāye samavadadhāti|
1389:559: ityābhiḥ pañcasaṃjñābhiḥ bhāvanāyā pariniṣpannābhiranekavidhamṛddhiṣayaṃ pratyanubhavatyeko bhūtvā bahudhātmānamupadarśayati|
1389:571: imau vā sūryācandramasāvevaṃ mahardhikau mahānubhāvau pāṇinā āmārṣṭi|
1389:581: tatra pūrvānubhūtacaritānukramānusmṛtisaṃjñā yayā kumārakabhāvamupādāya yatrāsya smṛtiḥ pravarttate|
1389:586: , śayito vistareṇa sarvvāṃ pūrvānubhūtāṃ caryāmaudāraudārikaudārikatayā anuparivāṭikayā avyutkramanti(nte)|
1389:588: tasyā bhāvanānvayād bhāvanāphalamanekavidhaṃ pūrvvenivāsaṃ samanusmarati yāvatsansā(saṃsā)
1389:597: nānāprakārasya janakāyasya sanniṣaṇṇasya sannipatitasya yo vyatimiśro,
1389:601: mahatyā vā nadyā vaha[n] tyā nirghoṣaḥ,
1389:602: tatra nimittamudgṛhya yā saṃjñābhāvanā yayā samāhitabhūmikena manasikāreṇāryā[']nāryeṣu śabdeṣu,
1389:605: tasyāsya bahulīkārānvayād bhāvanāphalaṃ divyaṃ śrotraṃ pratilabhate|
1389:612: yena divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhena vistareṇa yāvatkāyasya bhedātsvargatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyante(te)|
1389:632: yena parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ vitarkitaṃ vicāritaṃ mano manasā yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti|
1389:645: anāryayā na punarna tathaiva bhavatyapi tu|
1389:647: evamābhirdvādaśabhiḥ saṃjñābhirbahulīkārānvayādyathāyogaṃ sa pañcānāmabhijñānāmāryāṇāṃ ca guṇānāmapṛthagjanasandhāraṇānāṃ yathāyogamabhinirhāro veditavyaḥ|
1389:648: tatra prathame dhyāne mṛdumadhyādhimātraparibhāvitena yathāyogaṃ brahmakāyikānāṃ,
1389:651: ] dvitīye dhyāne mṛdumadhyādhimātrabhāvite yathāyogaṃ parīttānāmābhāsvarāṇāṃ ca devānāṃ sabhāgatāyāmupasaṃpadyate|
1389:658: sa cetpunaranāgāmī anāsraveṇa dhyānena caturthena sāsravaṃ,
1389:690: ityevaṃ bhāgīyāni vītarāgaliṃgāni veditavyānītyayaṃ tāvat laukikamārgagamanasya vibhāgaḥ||
1389:691: atha lokottareṇa mārgeṇa gantukāmo bhavati tasya catvāryāryasatyānyārabhya sapta manaskārā anupūrvveṇotpadyante|
1389:728: ] te punaḥ saṃskārāḥ samāsataḥ sattvalokaśca bhājanalokaśca||
1389:732: divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa satvāṃścyavamānāṃścotpadyamānāṃśca vistareṇa yāvat kāsasya bhedātsugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyante|
1389:733: ityanena tāvatparyāyeṇa ityanena tāvatparyāyeṇa bhagavatā cakṣuṣmatā pratyakṣadarśinā sattvalokasyānityatā vyākhyātā|
1389:737: sa samayo yaddīrghasyādhvano[']tyayādanupūrvveṇa yāvatsaptānāṃ sūryāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati|
1389:739: yāvadasyāḥ khalu mahāpṛthivyāḥ sumerośca parvvata rājasya|
1389:740: yāvacca brahmalokād bhājanalokasya dagdhasya dhmātasya maṣirapi na prajñāyate|
1389:744: tāvadāptāgamaṃ niśrityāyaṃ yogī śraddhādhipateyaṃ sarvasaṃskārānityatāyāṃ niścayaṃ pratilabhate||
1389:756: bāhyamvastu (sa evaṃ niścayaṃ pratilabhya śraddhādhipatyena punaḥ punaḥ pratyavekṣatāmaviparokṣatāmaparapratyayatā (ṃ)
1389:801: tatra kālaparivāso nāma yeṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ rūpiṇāṃ svasthāne[']pyupanyastakānāṃ kālāntareṇa jarjarato palabhyate|
1389:803: tatra paropakramo nāma yathāpi tat paro vividhāni rūpāṇi vividhaiḥ praharaṇaiḥ vividhairupakramaviśeṣaiḥ vicitrāṃ vikṛtimāpādayati|
1389:804: tatropabhogo nāma yathāpi tatpratisvāmino vividhaṃ rūpamupabhuṃjānā upabhogavidhipatitvā (gamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā vi)
1389:806: tatra ṛtuvipariṇāmo nāma tadyathā hemante tṛṇauṣadhivanaspatīnāṃ pāṇḍutvaṃ,
1389:814: tatrāgnidāho nāma yathāpi tadagnirmukto grāmanigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīrdahan paraiti|
1389:815: tatrodakakledo nāma tathāpi tanmahān udakaskandhaḥ samudāgato (grāmanigamarājarāṣṭradhānīṃ dahan paraiti|
1389:818: tatra vāyuśoṣo nāma tathāpi tanmahatā vāyuskandhenārdrāḥ pṛthivīpradeśā laghu laghveva śuṣyanti|
1389:820: pratyayāntarasamudgamo nāma tadyathā sukhavedanīyaṃ sparśaṃ pratītya sukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānasya sukhavedanīya(ḥ)
1389:824: sparśasamudgamaḥ] aduḥkhāsukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānasyā[']sukhavedanīyasya vā[']duḥkhavedanīyasya vā sparśasya samudgamaḥ|
1389:825: tathā raktasya pratighanimittasamudgamaḥ yasya samudgamādrāgaparyavasthānaṃ ca vigacchati|
1389:838: ihānecā(nā)tmano [vā] pareṣāmvā dahrāvasthāmupādāya yāvajjīrṇāvasthā dṛṣṭā bhavati|
1389:844: me saṃskārā[s] tathāpyeṣāṃ pratyakṣata eveyaṃ pūrvvaṇāparā vikṛtirupalabhyate|
1389:854: paścācca durvvarṇṇatāṃ duśchavitāṃ rukṣatāṃ rukṣavarṇṇatāṃ ca|
1389:856: ] dṛṣṭvā ca punareva pratyudāvarttyāpareṇa samayena tāmeva suvarṇṇatāṃ paryavadātatvagvarṇṇatāṃ ca paśyati|
1389:861: yathā varṇṇa ukta evaṃ kṛśasthūlatayā saṃsthānaṃ veditavyaṃ sampattirvipattiśca|
1389:891: tasyaivaṃ bhavatyanityā bateme saṃskārā iti pūrvvavat|
1389:893: evamātmano vā pareṣāmvā paropakrameṇa kāyavikṛtiṃ paśyati|
1389:899: ] apareṇa vā punaḥ samayena tāṃ vikṛtiṃ na paśyati|
1389:910: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ pratyudāvarttya punaḥ śītakāle pūrvvoktairevākāraiḥ paśyati|
1389:913: me saṃskārā iti pūrvvavadeva [ṃ] śītakṛtāṃ vipariṇāmānityatāṃ paryeṣate|
1389:917: dṛṣṭvā ca punarasyaivaṃ bhavatyanityā bateme saṃskārā iti pūrvvavat|
1389:921: sukhavedanīyaṃ sparśaṃ pratītyotpannāṃ sukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānaḥ|
1389:925: ] tasya pūrvvāṃ paryeṣaṇā āsāṃ vedanānāṃ navanavatāniḥpurāṇa purāṇatāmāpāyikatāṃ tāvatkālikatāmitvarapratyupāsthāyitamanyathībhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā,
1389:931: samohaṃ vigatamohamanyatamānyatamena vā upakleśenopakliṣṭaṃ cittamupakliṣṭamiti parijānāti|
1389:934: rvvāparyeṇaibhiḥ kleśopakleśairavatīparṇavipariṇatā[']vipariṇatāṃcittasantatiṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ bhavatyanityā bateme saṃskārā iti|
1389:968: vijñānaśūnyaṃ kalevaraṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punarasyaivaṃ bhavatīti vistareṇa pūrvvavat||
1389:973: ekadā vipūyakāvasthamenaṃ vistareṇa yāvasthiśaṃkalikāvasthaṃ dṛṣṭvāsyaivaṃ bhavatyanityā bata(te)
1389:983: me saṃskārāstathā hyeṣāṃ paurvvāparyeṇa pratyakṣata evāyamevaṃ rūpo vikāra upalabhyate|
1389:985: evaṃ tāvatpratyakṣādhipateyena manaskāreṇādhyātmikasya vastunaḥ [paṃca] daśabhirākārairvipariṇāmānityatāṃ vyavacārayati|
1389:988: ye'nena pṛthivīpradeśā nābhisaṃskṛtāḥ pūrvvaṃ dṛṣṭā bhavanti|
1389:993: titapatitān khalu chidrānagninā vā dagdhānudakena vāpahratāṃ(hṛtān)|
1389:998: ṣāṃ paurvvāparyeṇāyamevaṃrūpaḥ pratyakṣo vikāro vipariṇāma upalabhyate|
1389:1000: evaṃ tṛṇauṣadhivanaspataya ārāmodyānāni ca samṛddhapatrapuṣpaphalāni paśyati|
1389:1006: tathā parvatānyekadā samṛddhapāṣāṇāni paśyatyekadā nirluṭhitapāṣāṇāni patita śrṛṃgāṇi,
1389:1013: sarveṇa vā sarvvaṃ viśuṣkāṇi khilībhūtāni koṭarāṇi|
1389:1017: tathā kośasannidhīnāṃ vicitrāṇāṃ nānāprakārāṇāmekadā ācayaṃ paśyatyekadā apacayaṃ|
1389:1020: tathā vividhāni yānānyekadā sumaṇḍitāni svalaṃkṛtānyabhinavāni paśyatyekadā vigatālaṃkārāṇi|
1389:1039: ebhiraṣṭābhirvipariṇāmakāraṇaiḥ pūrvvanirdiṣṭairasyādhyātmikabāhyasya vastuno yathāyogaṃ pratyakṣādhipateyena manaskāreṇaivaṃ vipariṇāmākāreṇānityatāṃ vyavacārayati|
1389:1040: yathānena sā vipariṇāmānityatā pratyakṣaṃ dṛṣṭā bhavatyanubhūtā,
1389:1045: sa evaṃ pratyakṣādhipateyena manaskāreṇa vipariṇāmānityatāṃ vyavahā(cā)
1389:1047: yeṣāṃ rūpiṇāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ satī samvidyamānā kṣaṇotpannabhagnā vinīlatā(vilīnatā)
1389:1049: tatra pratyakṣādhipateyaṃ manaskāraṃ niśrityānumānaṃ karotyevañca punaranumānaṃ karoti|
1389:1052: iti hi kṣaṇikāḥ saṃskārāsteṣu teṣu pratyayeṣu satsu tathā tathotpadyante|
1389:1058: ] sahaiva tena vināśakāraṇena vinaṣṭānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ yasmādvisadṛśā (śī)
1389:1062: tadyathā kvāthyamānāmasāmante sarvveṇa sarvvamparikṣayo bhavatiagninirdagdhānāṃ ca lokabhājanānāṃ masirapi na[pra]jñāyate|
1389:1064: śiṣṭamapi na prajñāyate teṣāmapyuttarottarakaraṇaparyādānādante sarvveṇa sarvvamabhāvo bhavati|
1389:1066: ] tasmādvipariṇāmakāraṇānyetānyaṣṭau yathoktāni svarasenaiva tu vināśo bhavati|
1389:1067: sa evamānumānikamanaskāreṇa saṃskāreṇākṣaṇotpannabhagnavilīnatāyāṃ niścayaṃ pratilabhya punarapyapratyakṣaparalokāsaṃskārapravṛttāvanumānaṃ karoti||
1389:1088: sa cedīśvaranirmāṇahetukaṃ syāttadīśvarapratyayameva vā syādanyena vopādāneneśvaro nirmimīta|
1389:1089: sa cedīśvara pratyayameva syāt teneśvarasyaiṣāñca saṃskārāṇāṃ yaugapadyaṃ syāt|
1389:1096: ] yadi sahetukā īśvarahetukaiva ca tena pūrvvakeṇa doṣeṇa tulyatayā na yujyate|
1389:1099: praṇidhānamīśvaravinirmuktānyadharmahetukā tathā sarvve[']pi saṃskārā dharmahetukā eva bhaviṣyanti|
1389:1104: tatra yā pūrvva pañca [vidhā'] nityatā pañcākārabhāvanānugatā uddiṣṭā,
1389:1113: sopareṇa samayena svāmibhāvamadāsabhāvaṃ vihāya pareṣāṃ dāsabhāvamupagacchati|
1389:1120: tatra dharmatākārā ['] nityatā yathāpi tasyā eva vipariṇāmānityatāyāḥ vināśānityatāyāḥ|
1389:1122: [']dhvani bhāvinyā dharmatāṃ pratividhyatyevaṃ dharmāṇa ete saṃskārā anāgate[']dhvani evaṃbhāgīyā iti|
1389:1127: sa evamādhyātmikabāhyānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ pañcavidhāyāmanityatāyāmebhiḥ pañcabhirākārairyathāyogaṃ manasikārabāhulyādupapattisādhanabhāvanādhipatyācca niye(rme)
1389:1132: iti hyeta eva saṃskārā jātidharmāṇaḥ jātiśca duḥkhā, yadā(yā)
1389:1147: tathā hyaduḥkhāsukhāsthānīyāḥ skandhāḥ sopādānā dauṣṭhulyasahagatā abījānugatā avinirmuktā duḥkhaduḥkhatayā,
1389:1152: yaduta saṃyojanabandhanākāreṇa duḥkhavedanāsthānīyeṣu saṃskāreṣuduḥkhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ duḥkhaduḥkhatāmavatīrṇṇo bhavati|
1389:1157: saṃyojanabandhanākāramaniṣṭākāraṃ yogakṣemākāraṃ cādhipatiṃ kṛtvā tisṛṣu vedanāsu yatkiñcidvedayitamidamatra duḥkhasyetyevamayamanityākārapūrvvakeṇa manaskāreṇa duḥkhākāramavatīrṇṇo bhavati|
1389:1197: yasya prahāṇādasya duḥkhasya prahāṇaṃ syādityebhiścaturbhirākāraissamudayasatyasya lakṣaṇaṃ pratisaṃvedayati|
1389:1204: upādānahetukasya ca bhavasya samudāgamādbhavapūrvikāyā jāteḥ prabhavatvāt,
1389:1213: ] yaḥ kleśānuśaya āśraya[ḥ] punarbhavāmabhinirvṛttaye hetustajjasya ca paryavasthānasya yathāyogaṃ veditavyaṃ [|
1389:1216: sa āyatyāṃ punarbhavābhinirvṛttaye hetustajjasya ca paryavasthānasya yathāyogaṃ samudayaḥ,
1389:1220: sāpuna[ḥ]paunarbhavikī tṛṣṇā nandīrāgasahagatāyāstṛṣṇāyāḥ prabhavo bhavati sā punarnandīrāgasahagatā tṛṣṇā prabhūtā,
1389:1221: tatra tatrābhinandinyāstṛṣṇāyāḥ pratyayo bhavatyevamasyānuśayagatāṃ trividhaparyavasthāgatāṃ ca tṛṣṇāmāgamyāyati[ḥ]|
1389:1228: samudayasatyalakṣaṇaṃ pratisaṃvedya asya samudayasatyasyāśeṣoparamannirodhaṃ nirodhata ākārayati|
1389:1244: sa evaṃ pratyātmikān skandhān pratyayenopaparīkṣya vyavacārayitvā (vyavacārya)
1389:1248: yatkiñcitsaṃskṛtaṃ sarvatra sarvaśaḥ [evaṃ tadevaṃ pratisaṃvedī manaskāraḥ|
1389:1251: te[']pyevaṃ dharmāṇaste[']pyevaṃ nayapatitā iti yatkiñcitsaṃskṛtaṃ sarvvatra sarvaśa] evaṃ tadevaṃprakṛtikaṃ,
1389:1254: nairyāṇiko yastatprahāṇāya tasya yadā vipakṣokteṣu pratyātmikeṣu skandheṣu satyajñānaṃ|
1389:1257: sa cāyaṃ lakṣaṇapratisaṃvedī manaskāraḥ śrutacintāvyavakīrṇṇo veditavyaḥ|
1389:1258: yadā teṣu satyeṣvayaṃ yogī evaṃ samyak(g)
1389:1262: tadā śrutacintāmayaṃ manaskāraṃ samatikramya vyavatīrṇṇavarttinamekāntena bhāvanākāreṇādhimucyate|
1389:1265: ] sa tasyānvayā[d]dve satye adhikṛtya duḥkhasatyañca samudayasatyañca aparyantaṃ jñānaṃ pratilabhate|
1389:1316: ānimittamānimittataḥ paśyāmi mamaite dharmāstaddhetostatpratyayasya taccittaṃ na praskandatyā(tya)
1389:1320: raṃ vibandhakāra iti laghu laghveva prajñayā pratividhya,
1389:1327: sa utpannotpannaṃ cittaṃ nirudhyamānamanantarotpannena cittena bhajyamānaṃ paśyati|
1389:1333: tathā prayukto[']yaṃ yogī yattasyāścittasantateḥ anyo[']nyatāṃ navanavatāmāpāyikatāṃ tāvatkālikatāmitvarapratyupasthāyitāñca paurvvāparyeṇa paśyatīdamasyā[a]nityatāyā yattasyāścittasantateḥ upādānaskandhānupraviṣṭatāṃ paśyatīdamasya duḥkhatāyāstatra yaccittaṃ dharmaṃ nopalabhate|
1389:1341: ] asyā api cittasanteteryo nirodhaḥ so[']pi śāntaḥ|
1389:1343: sa nairyāṇika ityevamaparīkṣitamanaskāraparīkṣāyogena sūkṣmayā prajñayā na tānyāryasatyānyavatīrṇṇo bhavati|
1389:1358: tasya taccittaṃ tasmin samaye niruddhamiva khyāti|
1389:1371: tasya tatsarvvapaścimanirvvikalpaṃcittaṃ yasyānantaraṃ pūrvavicāriteṣu satveṣvadhyātmamābhogaṃ karoti|
1389:1381: tasyotpādāt traidhātukāvacarāṇāṃ darśanaprahātavyānāṃ kleśānāṃ pakṣyaṃ dauṣṭhulyasanniśrayasanniviṣṭaṃ tatprahīyate|
1389:1382: tasya prahāṇāt sacetpūrvvameva kāmebhyo vītarāgo bhavati|
1389:1393: sa bhūyassa tasya dauṣṭhulyasya pratipraśrabdheḥ srota āpanno bhavati|
1389:1400: tasyemāni liṃgāni catvāri jñānānyanena pratilabdhāni bhavanti|
1389:1430: tasya yāvallaukikebhyo[']gradharmebhya adhimokṣiko manaskāraḥ satyānyabhisamitavataḥ darśanaprahātavyeṣu kleśeṣu prahīṇeṣu prāvivekyo manaskāraḥ,
1389:1432: ata ūrdhvaṃ yathāpratilabdhaṃ mārgaṃ bhāvayato[']bhyasyataḥ kāmāvacarāṇāmadhimātramadhyānāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇāt sakṛdāgāmī bhavati|
1389:1435: ayañca viśeṣo yadviṣaye[']dharakleśasthānīyeṣu adhimātraparyavasthānīye[']pi baddhaṃ kleśaparyavasthānamutpādayatyāśu cāpanayati|
1389:1438: anāgāmiliṃgāni ca pūrvvoktānītyeva tatra sarvvo bhāvanāmārgaḥ pratyavekṣya pratyavekṣya mīmānsā(māṃsa)
1389:1443: yaḥ samāhitabhūmikena manaskāreṇa laukikalokottareṇaiṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ saṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāmabhyāsaḥ|
1389:1451: tatra ye tāvadapratilabdhā dharmāḥ kuśalā vaiśeṣikāstān pratilabhate|
1389:1479: tathā tathā adhobhūmikāḥ prahāṇādharmā dūrī bhavanti|
1389:1491: tatra laukikamārgabhāvanā [ya] dadhobhūmikānāmaudārikadarśanatayā uparibhūmīnāṃ ca śāntadarśanatayā,
1389:1493: tatra lokottaramārgabhāvanā duḥkhaṃ vā duḥkhato manasikurvvataḥ,
1389:1497: tatra madhyamārgabhāvanā yayā madhyān kleśān prajahāti|
1389:1498: tatrādhi[mātra] mārgabhāvanā yayā mṛduṃ kleśaprakāraṃ prajahāti|
1389:1500: tatra prayogamārgabhāvanā yayā prayogamārabhate kleśa prahāṇāya|
1389:1502: tatra vimuktimārgabhāvanā yayā samanantaraprahīṇe kleśavimuktiṃ sākṣātkaroti|
1389:1507: tasyaivaṃ bhāvanāprayuktasya kālena ca kālaṃ kleśānāṃ prahīṇāprahīṇatāṃ mīmānsa(māṃsa)
1389:1509: kālena kālaṃ saṃvejanīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ samvejayataḥ,
1389:1511: tasyāsya ratisaṃgrāhakasya manaskārasyāsevanānvayād bhāvanānvayādbahulīkārānvayānniravaśeṣabhāvanāprahātavyā [ḥ] kleśaprahāṇāya sarvvapaścimaḥ śaikṣo vajropamaḥ samādhirutpadyate|
1389:1521: tasya vajropamasya samādheḥ samanantaraṃ sarvvakleśapakṣyaṃ dauṣṭhulyabījasamuddhātādatyantatāyai cittamadhimucyate|
1389:1530: aśaikṣayā samyagdṛṣṭyā samyaksaṃkalpena yāvadaśaikṣayā samyagvimuktyā samyagjñānena [|
1389:1538: yaṃ yamevākāṃkṣate dharmaṃ manasi karttuṃ kuśalamarthopasaṃhitaṃ|
1389:1552: kta cittaḥ, suvimuktaprajñaḥ kevalo ukṣi..........cca...........li puruṣa ityucyate|
1389:1555: bhavati suṣṭhumanāḥ upekṣako bhavati smṛtaḥ samprajā[nā]naḥ|
1389:1566: samacittaśca bhavati vāsī candanakalpaḥ sendro pitryāṇāṃ devānāṃ mānyaśca pūjyaśca mārgakāśeṣadhātupratiṣṭhite ca bhavati tīrṇṇaḥ pāragato[']ntimādehadhārītyucyate|
1389:1567: pūrvakarmakleśāviddhānāṃ pañca skandhānāṃ svarasaṃ..........nānu pādānāt vā,
1389:1571: nānyatra yad duḥkhaṃ tanniruddhaṃ tavyupaśāntaṃ tacchītībhūtaṃ bhava iṃ gataṃ|
1389:1573: yaduta sarvvopadhipratiniḥsarvasaṃjñākṣayo virāgo nirodho nirvāṇaṃ tasyemāni liṃgānyevaṃ bhāgīyāni veditavyāni|
1389:1577: prāpayituṃ mandadā tra ma brahmacaryaṃ maithunaṃ dharmaṃ pratiṣevituṃ|
1389:1580: tathā bhavyaḥ svayaṃ kṛtaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyetuṃ|
1389:1583: 'anyatāmānyatamvā bhayabhairavaṃ........saṃtrāsamāpattu rayamasau vajropamaḥ samādhirayaṃ prayoganiṣṭho manaskāraḥ yaḥ punaragraphalārhattvasaṃgṛhītamanaskāro'yaṃ prayoganiṣṭhāphalo manaskāraḥ|
1389:1584: ebhiḥ saptabhirmanaskārairlokottareṇa mārgeṇātyantaniṣṭhāt ā/prā pā taḥ-ta
1389:1585: ityayamucyate sā/mo dha ka sarvveṣāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃyuktānāṃ nirdeśasthānīyānāṃ sākṣātkā[ra] sthānīyānāṃ tadyathā sarvanāmakāyapadakāyavyaṃjanakāyakāvyamanu śāstrāṇi|| mātṛkā||
